short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to kno what theme or app a store is running? Relax, we got this

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever been on a Shopify store and you wanted to know what they were using? Maybe it was an app or maybe it was their theme. Well ShopifyNerds has you covered! We'll be updating this free tool often so you'll be able to get a leg up on the competition!
